ygData.subject: Re: Pet Question....
ygData.msgSnippet: It is one faster than a normal Giant Snake Fang, I believe 5/28 (magic) But I could be wrong. If you are getting a magician to summon a weapon for your pet, go
ygData.messageBody:
It is one faster than a normal Giant Snake Fang, I believe 5/28 (magic)
But I could be wrong.

If you are getting a magician to summon a weapon for your pet, go for
the lvl 1 summon dagger spell, its 3/21 but magical, if people are
accurate that only the speed matters then that is your best bet... No
to mention if with you're a magician make sure he fire sheilds your pet,
they really kick butt with that...

--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
